ViewObject.Name: InvoiceView
ViewObject.SQLQuery:
SELECT I.INSPECTION_ID, I.INSPECTION_NUMBER, trunc(I.invoice_date) CitationIssueDate, O.LEGAL_NAME, O.ORGANIZATION_NAME, trunc(INS_APPEAL.APPEAL_DATE) APPEAL_DATE, trunc(R.REFERRAL_DATE) REFERRAL_DATE, RTIM.INDEX_CODE, P.FIRST_NAME, P.MIDDLE_NAME, P.LAST_NAME, initcap(P.LAST_NAME)||', '||initcap(P.FIRST_NAME) REFERRED_TO, I.CSHO_ID, R.STATUS, PR.PARTY_ID, INS_APPEAL.APPEAL_ID, trunc(INS_APPEAL.CLOSED_DATE) CLOSED_DATE, INS_APPEAL.APPEAL_TYPE_CODE, NULL DOCKET_NUMBER , --INS_APPEAL.DOCKET_NUMBER, NULL DOCKET_THROUGH_NUMBER, --INS_APPEAL.docket_through_number, INV_PAY.INITIAL_AMOUNT InitialAmount, NVL(INV_PAY.INITIAL_AMOUNT, 0) + NVL(INV_PAY.AdjustmentAmount, 0) CurrentAmount, INV_PAY.APPEAL_AMOUNT InvoiceAppealAmount, INV_PAY.APPEAL_DECISION_AMOUNT InvoiceDecisionAmount, INV_PAY.TOTAL_BILLED_PAYMENT totalPayments, INV_PAY.TOTAL_UNBILLED_PAYMENT totalUnbillPayments, --INV_PAY.INVOICE_BALANCE InvoiceBalance, JudgmentFilingDate, PPA.Pmt_Plan_SetupDate, TRUNC(INV_REFERRAL_PKG.FUNC_LETTER_SEND_DATE( p_InspectionId => I.INSPECTION_ID, p_CorrespondenceType => 'ACCOUNTING_REMINDER', p_Status => 'GENERATED' )) ACCTG_LETTER, TRUNC(INV_REFERRAL_PKG.FUNC_LETTER_SEND_DATE( p_InspectionId => I.INSPECTION_ID, p_CorrespondenceType => 'COLLECTION_REMINDER', p_Status => 'GENERATED' )) COLL_LETTER, TRUNC(INV_REFERRAL_PKG.FUNC_LETTER_SEND_DATE( p_InspectionId => I.INSPECTION_ID, p_CorrespondenceType => '1P_LETTER', p_Status => 'GENERATED' )) ONEP_LETTER, TRUNC(INV_REFERRAL_PKG.FUNC_LETTER_SEND_DATE( p_InspectionId => I.INSPECTION_ID, p_CorrespondenceType => 'DEMAND_LETTER', p_Status => 'GENERATED' )) DEMAND_LETTER, TRUNC(INV_REFERRAL_PKG.FUNC_LETTER_SEND_DATE( p_InspectionId => I.INSPECTION_ID, p_CorrespondenceType => 'DEMAND_LETTER', p_Status => 'GENERATED' ) + 30) EDD_ELIGIBLE, TRUNC(SYSDATE) CURRENT_DATE, COE_DOSH.RECEIVED_DATE DOSH_COE_DATE, COE_OSHAB.RECEIVED_DATE OSHAB_COE_DATE, I.REPORT_INDEX_MAP_ID, NVL(COURT_DUE,0) COURT_DUE, NVL(INTEREST_DUE,0) INTEREST_DUE, NVL(NSF_DUE,0) NSF_DUE, NVL(COLLECT_FEE_DUE,0) COLLECT_FEE_DUE, INSPECTION_HISTORY.STATUS_DATE REFERRED_EDD, R.REFERRAL_ID, P.PARTY_ID AS PERSON_ID, NVL2(PPA.Pmt_Plan_Status, PPA.Pmt_Plan_Status, 'NO_PAY_PLAN') as PmtPlanStatus, NVL2(NVL2(APPEAL_DATE, TO_CHAR(INS_APPEAL.CLOSED_DATE), 'NO_APPEAL'), 'NOT_OPEN','OPEN') IS_APPEAL_OPEN
FROM INSPECTION I, REPORTING_TO_INDEX_MAP RTIM, PARTICIPANT_ROLE PR, ORGANIZATION O, REFERRAL R, RELATED_PARTY RP, PERSON P, (SELECT distinct AD.inspection_id, A.appeal_date, A.appeal_id, A.closed_date, A.appeal_type_code from APPEAL A, APPEAL_DETAIL AD where A.appeal_id = AD.appeal_id AND AD.STATUS <> 'DELETED' ) INS_APPEAL, ( SELECT CIT_ITEM.INSPECTION_ID, CIT_ITEM.CurrentAmount CURRENT_AMOUNT, CIT_ITEM.InitialAmount INITIAL_AMOUNT, NVL(BILLED_AMOUNT.totalPayments,0) TOTAL_BILLED_PAYMENT, NVL(UNBILLED_AMOUNT.totalUnbilledPayments,0) TOTAL_UNBILLED_PAYMENT, NVL(APPEAL_AMOUNT.InvoiceAppealAmount,0) APPEAL_AMOUNT, NVL(APPEAL_AMOUNT.InvoiceDecisionAmount,0) APPEAL_DECISION_AMOUNT, ADJ_AMT.AdjustmentAmount AdjustmentAmount FROM ( SELECT PA.inspection_id INSPECTION_ID, sum(nvl(PA.allocated_amount,0)) totalPayments FROM payment_allocation PA WHERE PA.inspection_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY PA.inspection_id ) BILLED_AMOUNT, ( SELECT PA.unbilled_inspection_id INSPECTION_ID, sum(nvl(PA.allocated_amount,0)) totalUnbilledPayments FROM payment_allocation PA WHERE PA.unbilled_inspection_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY PA.unbilled_inspection_id ) UNBILLED_AMOUNT, ( SELECT ADL.inspection_id INSPECTION_ID, sum(nvl(ADL.appealed_amount,0)) InvoiceAppealAmount, sum(nvl(ADL.decision_amount,0)) InvoiceDecisionAmount FROM appeal_detail ADL WHERE ADL.STATUS <> 'DELETED' GROUP BY ADL.inspection_id ) APPEAL_AMOUNT, ( SELECT CI.inspection_id, sum(nvl(CI.current_amount,0) + nvl(CI.current_fta_amount,0)) CurrentAmount, sum(nvl(CI.initial_amount,0) + nvl(CI.initial_fta_amount,0)) InitialAmount FROM CITATION_ITEM CI GROUP BY CI.inspection_id ) CIT_ITEM, ( SELECT ADJUSTMENT.INSPECTION_ID, SUM(ADJUSTMENT.ADJUSTMENT_AMOUNT) AdjustmentAmount FROM ADJUSTMENT GROUP BY inspection_id ) ADJ_AMT WHERE BILLED_AMOUNT.INSPECTION_ID (+) = CIT_ITEM.INSPECTION_ID AND UNBILLED_AMOUNT.INSPECTION_ID (+) = CIT_ITEM.INSPECTION_ID AND APPEAL_AMOUNT.INSPECTION_ID (+) = CIT_ITEM.INSPECTION_ID AND ADJ_AMT.INSPECTION_ID (+) = CIT_ITEM.INSPECTION_ID ) INV_PAY, (SELECT INSPECTION_ID, TRUNC(STATUS_DATE) RECEIVED_DATE FROM COE_REQUEST INNER JOIN RELATED_PARTY ON (COE_REQUEST.COE_REQUEST_ID = RELATED_PARTY.COE_REQUEST_ID) INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION ON (RELATED_PARTY.PARTY_ID = ORGANIZATION.PARTY_ID) WHERE COE_REQUEST.STATUS = 'RECEIVED' AND ORGANIZATION_NAME = 'CALOSHA OFFICE HEADQUARTERS') COE_DOSH, (SELECT INSPECTION_ID, TRUNC(STATUS_DATE) RECEIVED_DATE FROM COE_REQUEST INNER JOIN RELATED_PARTY ON (COE_REQUEST.COE_REQUEST_ID = RELATED_PARTY.COE_REQUEST_ID) INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION ON (RELATED_PARTY.PARTY_ID = ORGANIZATION.PARTY_ID) WHERE COE_REQUEST.STATUS = 'RECEIVED' AND ORGANIZATION_NAME = 'OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY AND HEALTH APPEALS BOARD') COE_OSHAB, ( SELECT INSPECTION_ID, NVL("'UNBILLED_COLLECTION_FEE'_AMT_", 0) - NVL("'UNBILLED_COLLECTION_FEE'_ALLO", 0) COLLECT_FEE_DUE, NVL("'UNBILLED_COURT_FEE'_AMT_DUE", 0) - NVL("'UNBILLED_COURT_FEE'_ALLOCATED", 0) COURT_DUE, NVL("'UNBILLED_INTEREST'_AMT_DUE", 0) - NVL("'UNBILLED_INTEREST'_ALLOCATED_", 0) INTEREST_DUE, NVL("'UNBILLED_NSF_FEE'_AMT_DUE", 0) - NVL("'UNBILLED_NSF_FEE'_ALLOCATED_A", 0) NSF_DUE
FROM ( SELECT UnbilledItem.INSPECTION_ID, SUM(UnbilledItem.UNBILLED_AMOUNT) AMT_DUE, SUM(PAID_TOWARD_UNBILLED.ALLOCATED_AMOUNT) ALLOCATED_AMOUNT, PartyAgencyFundMap.BILL_TYPE_CODE AMT_TYPE
FROM UNBILLED_ITEM UnbilledItem
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PaymentAllocation.UNBILLED_ITEM_ID, SUM(PaymentAllocation.ALLOCATED_AMOUNT) ALLOCATED_AMOUNT FROM PAYMENT_ALLOCATION PaymentAllocation GROUP BY PaymentAllocation.UNBILLED_ITEM_ID ) PAID_TOWARD_UNBILLED ON PAID_TOWARD_UNBILLED.UNBILLED_ITEM_ID = UnbilledItem.UNBILLED_ITEM_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN PARTY_AGENCY_FUND_MAP PartyAgencyFundMap ON PartyAgencyFundMap.PARTY_AGENCY_FUND_MAP_ID = UnbilledItem.PARTY_AGENCY_FUND_ID
WHERE PartyAgencyFundMap.BILL_TYPE_CODE <> 'UNAPPLIED' and UnbilledItem.status <> 'CANCELLED'
GROUP BY UnbilledItem.INSPECTION_ID, UnbilledItem.UNBILLED_ITEM_ID, PartyAgencyFundMap.BILL_TYPE_CODE)
PIVOT ( SUM(AMT_DUE) AMT_DUE, SUM(ALLOCATED_AMOUNT) ALLOCATED_AMOUNT FOR AMT_TYPE IN ('UNBILLED_COLLECTION_FEE', 'UNBILLED_COURT_FEE', 'UNBILLED_INTEREST', 'UNBILLED_NSF_FEE') ) ) UNBILLED_AMTS_DUE, (SELECT TRUNC(MAX(STATUS_DATE)) STATUS_DATE, INSPECTION_ID FROM INSPECTION_HISTORY WHERE STATUS_CODE = 'REFERRED_TO_EDD' GROUP BY INSPECTION_ID) INSPECTION_HISTORY, (select max(trunc(filing_date)) JudgmentFilingDate, J.inspection_id from JUDGMENT J, JUDGMENT_DETAIL JD, INSPECTION I where J.judgment_id = JD.judgment_id and J.inspection_id = I.INSPECTION_ID AND J.STATUS NOT IN ('CANCELLED', 'VACATED') AND JUDGMENT_FILE_TYPE_CODE = 'JUDGMENT_FILE' GROUP BY J.inspection_id) JudgmentFiling,
(select MAX(trunc(setup_date)) Pmt_Plan_SetupDate, MAX(STATUS) Pmt_Plan_Status, inspection_id from PAYMENT_PLAN_AGREEMENT PPA group by inspection_id) PPA WHERE I.INSPECTION_ID = PR.INSPECTION_ID AND I.INSPECTION_ID = PPA.INSPECTION_ID (+) AND I.INSPECTION_ID = R.INSPECTION_ID AND R.REFERRAL_ID = RP.REFERRAL_ID AND R.STATUS <> 'DELETED' AND RP.PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND RP.STATUS = 'NEW' AND I.INSPECTION_ID = INV_PAY.INSPECTION_ID and I.REPORT_INDEX_MAP_ID = RTIM.REPORT_INDEX_MAP_ID AND PR.PARTY_ID = O.PARTY_ID and I.INSPECTION_ID = INS_APPEAL.INSPECTION_ID (+) AND PR.PARTICIPANT_ROLE_TYPE_CODE = 'RES_PARTY' and I.STATUS = 'ACTIVE' AND RP.PARTICIPANT_ROLE_TYPE_CODE = 'REFERRED' AND COE_DOSH.INSPECTION_ID (+) = I.INSPECTION_ID AND COE_OSHAB.INSPECTION_ID (+) = I.INSPECTION_ID AND I.INSPECTION_ID = UNBILLED_AMTS_DUE.INSPECTION_ID (+) AND I.INSPECTION_ID = INSPECTION_HISTORY.INSPECTION_ID (+) AND I.INSPECTION_ID = JudgmentFiling.INSPECTION_ID (+)

ViewAttribute.Name: Invoicebalance
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: AppealDate != null && ClosedDate == null ? Currentamount - Invoiceappealamount - Totalpayments : Currentamount - Totalpayments

ViewAttribute.Name: EddReferrable
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: EddEligible != null && CurrentDate > EddEligible && ReferredEdd == null && Status == "NEW" && Invoicebalance > 0 && IsAppealOpen == "NOT_OPEN" && Pmtplanstatus != "PAID" && Pmtplanstatus != "NEW" ? "YES" : "NO"
